actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning ratification of the Geneva Protocol of 1925, and a comprehensive review of this Nation's policies regarding chemical warfare.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Geneva Protocol of 1925 should be ratified immediately and that a comprehensive review of the nation's policies regarding chemical warfare should be undertaken.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning ratification of the Geneva Protocol of 1925, and a comprehensive review of this Nation's policies regarding chemical warfare.
